title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - It's About Time! Improving Distributed Systems with Amazon Time Sync (CMP409)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 关于时间！使用 Amazon Time Sync 改进分布式系统 (CMP409)
abstract: Keeping track of the order of events in distributed systems is one of the most fundamental and important problems in computer science. In 2023, we improved the Amazon Time Sync Service to microsecond-level clock accuracy so we, and our customers, can use wall-clock time in applications including databases, AI/ML, financial services, broadcast/media, telecommunications, and more to improve both the performance and resiliency of our systems and applications. We will be sharing how with real-world examples of AWS services now leveraging this capability, and Nasdaq will be sharing how they are using precision time to build their next generation cloud applications.
abstract_cn: 在分布式系统中跟踪事件顺序是计算机科学中最基本和最重要的问题之一。2023年，我们将Amazon Time Sync Service改进到微秒级时钟精度，使我们和我们的客户能够在数据库、AI/ML、金融服务、广播/媒体、电信等应用中使用挂钟时间，以提高系统和应用程序的性能和弹性。我们将通过现在利用此功能的AWS服务的实际案例来分享具体方法，纳斯达克也将分享他们如何使用精确时间来构建下一代云应用程序。

presenter.name: Josh Levinson
presenter.title: Principal Product Manager, Technical, External Services, EC2 Core Product Management
